## What is Trade With Price Improvement?

Equity market products must be traded on a lit market (ASX trading platform). Why?
Promotes liquidity and price formation.
Exception:
- block trade
- portfolio trade
- out-of-hours trade
- Trade with price improvement (TWPI)

Price Improvement: higher than best bid, lower than best offer

Allowed because better price than lit market -> investor's gain
